## fmtDate() function

Format a date.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function fmtDate(date: any, splitter?: string): string
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter

</th><th>

Type

</th><th>

Description

</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

date

</td><td>

any

</td><td>

Date object, string, or timestamp

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

splitter

</td><td>

string

</td><td>

_(Optional)_

</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

string

Formatted date string

## Example

```
fmtDate('2020-01-01') // '2020-01-01'
fmtDate('2020-01-01', '') // '20200101'
fmtDate('2020-01-01', 'a') // '2020a01a01'
```
